website_summaries.verdict: An enduring favorite among kids and parents, this affordable locomotive is ideal as a first set, as an intriguing add-on, or as a gift for toddlers.
pros: Numbered train cars help kids learn to count while they play
Toddlers can get creative with building and stacking blocks in different ways or have fun simply taking the train for a ride
Includes 2 LEGO figures and a cat for ride-along, role-playing fun
cons: Fewer pieces than others on our list

customer_reviews.title: I love LEGO products
customer_reviews.text: Generally, I love LEGO products, but I bought this product because my son loves to make trains...the longer, the better. I loved that the picture of this set because it had a locomotive and 3 wagons (which was confirmed by the product description). VERY disappointed to find that the box actually contains 3 wheels TOTAL...only enough to build a locomotive and 2 wagons. As my previous LEGO purchases have included all the pieces to build the item(s) featured on the front of the box, I thought this picture was misleading at best, and I advise the manufacturer to change it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A.

customer_reviews.title: my 2-yr old loved it! And
customer_reviews.text: First off, my 2-yr old loved it! And, this may seem nit-picky, but -- it comes apart really easily. It's meant for little hands, YES. But a simple run around the floor and it came apart, which was frustrating. Otherwise, it's brightly colored and just adorable!
customer_reviews.author: DCowan

customer_reviews.title: Great on-flight entertainment for an 18-month-old
customer_reviews.text: At the recommendation of another parent, I purchased this set for my 18-month-old as a way to entertain him on a long trans-Atlantic flight. All of the parts are very lightweight, so it wasn't a nuisance to carry around in his diaper bag. He loves the trains and the people that are included. This is our first Duplo set and we love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Kashi

customer_reviews.title: He likes it and always put the little toy in his month just like pacifier.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Little for his first Christmas. He likes it and always put the little toy in his month just like pacifier.
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: Lego duplo is awesome, you can throw it in the dishwasher or ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our go to product for birthday presents. Lego duplo is awesome, you can throw it in the dishwasher or washing machine any time and it comes out like new. I have some that is 30 years old that I played with. The train itself rolls nicely and the numbers are so much fun. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: SaskiaH

customer_reviews.title: Really good way to let the kid have an idea of ...
customer_reviews.text: Really good way to let the kid have an idea of a train and the freedom to assembly it in anyway he'd like. Help creating a self imagination within direction that a child might need. On his own, the child is creating an actual product as well as creating and achievement for the much needed positive self esteem.
customer_reviews.author: L.H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves Duplo legos and it's endless creative fun. We have many sets and this train made an excellent addition to our collection! Cannot stop playing with it and it's even more entertaining and educational when combined with My 1st animal brick set, which is practically another train with animal cars. Numbers are not stickers, but quality prints. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alpha WolframTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: We’ll be enjoying this for a while!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son’s first birthday. He’s a little young to “get” the train but he loves the little figurines and will be playing with this for a long time to come!
customer_reviews.author: BLR

customer_reviews.title: Great train and step up from megabloks!
customer_reviews.text: Our girls love megabloks but have them mastered so we wanted to take the next step in blocks. They also have been recently obsessed with trains but I wasn’t looking for a whole set with tracks and the whole 9 yards (which is hard to find). This set is the best of both words! The train is pretty easy to assemble but it also stays together pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: A&MW11

customer_reviews.title: Blocks don't stick to each other
customer_reviews.text: Cute idea but the blocks themselves are so hard to work with. I don't have a lot of experience with duplo blocks but they do not stick together like regular legos. They fall apart with even just a light touch. Very frustrating for a toddler. I'm not a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Casiano

customer_reviews.title: Yes! These are worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My two year old loves it! I had Duplos as a child and wanted my little guy to have some. He would have kept playing with them, but I coaxed to stop him by showing how fun it was to put them in their designated box. Then I promptly took them and put them away. Definitely buy these!! You won't be disappointed! I knew we would love them so much we bought two other sets! One Duplo set that comes in its own green box and a knock off to try.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I love the size
customer_reviews.text: This is for Christmas for my grandson. I love the size, perfect for little hands and creative little minds. I’ll put a picture in of some that we already have.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Best

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the look of the duplo train set, but I didn't open it when it arrived because I thought my grandson was too young for it. I put it away for the following Christmas. He opened it yesterday for the first time. I had to use a knife to cut the tape of the box. The box consisted of 2 bags of parts. One of the bags was open. The train was not in the box nor were the characters as shown on the box. The period of time to return this item has expired, but in my opinion Amazon should replace the entire set because it wasn't complete and I'm a very good customer.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah

customer_reviews.title: Lego is the best!
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I was a child, my lego toys kept me occupied for hours and hours. I have found these are perfect for my 13 month old. Though they are intended for 18+months, I took away the boy, girl, and cat parts (these are the smallest parts in the set) and was pleased to see that everything else was safe for him to play with. Of course, always use caution even if it was safe for my child, it may not be safe for yours! Nevertheless, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my almost 2 year old nephew and he loves playing with it. He needs some help getting it together correctly, but overall he likes to put the legos together and take them apart and start all over again. The numbers are a cute touch and make this a fun learning toy too. I was very happy with the price on Amazon, since I had previously seen it in Department stores for at least five dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: Liv D.

customer_reviews.title: Masterpiece
customer_reviews.text: If you have a kid who loves building then LEGO duplo is the best toy one could gift. We started with a small bus and an emergency vehicle and realized how hooked up my son was. We got him this train set and there is no other toy that can keep him enraged for almost close to an hour. I am talking about a toddler who is almost 2 . It is a very safe toy, absolutely kid friendly , and cannot go wrong . It kindles a lot of imaginative play. I would definitely suggest this to anybody who is having a toddler who is crazy about moving vehicles and loves to build
customer_reviews.author: Vinodh

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for a one year old and he enjoyed it. It'll last him for years and help ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for a one year old and he enjoyed it. It'll last him for years and help him to learn his numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Love It ❤️
customer_reviews.text: We bought the Lego Duplo My First Number Train for our daughters second birthday. She absolutely loved it. It was fun putting it together with her and then watching her play with the train. She really liked the little people and cat that came with the train she walks around everywhere with them.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great even for 14-month-old
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 14 month old. The baby loves rolling it and taking it apart. He’ll grow into it, but loves it already! He couldn’t wait to show it to his mom and dad. Engine hood pops up so you can put a person inside. Cat sits anywhere. Big hit! Creative with tons of play applications.
customer_reviews.author: SoundsGood2Me

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for toddlers. I got our oldest one when he was younger and he played with it the most. We still have it but decided to order another one for our youngest so they can play together with them. They love counting as they put the blocks on. It's adorable
customer_reviews.author: AlaskanLost

customer_reviews.title: Simple beginner LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: I have a 4 year old and a 20 month old and they both like legos. They actually prefer just building their own towers but sometimes my 4 year old likes to use the train in pretend play. I also have this toy at work (speech therapist) and every kid seems to love it. I can incorporate it into all kinds of speech and language activities.
customer_reviews.author: Dan h.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable.  Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old grandson loves it. He likes to take the characters out of the trolley and put them back in over and over. He also announces who is going to be speaking before he pushes a button. We love the series and I recommend the this toy.
customer_reviews.author: C Sully

customer_reviews.title: Choo choo
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for a 2 year old. He isn't putting it together ;) . but he can chew on in instead of swallowing it. His dad can put it together and when older I can switch him to legos. Hopefully he'll have trains on his mind by then. Choo Choo.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Imagination station!
customer_reviews.text: Fun for us! 6 year old still loves his duplos. Tried legos- too frustrating for the children and even me when things fall apart or break off. These are easy to handle for imaginative play and don't hurt your fingers like legos can. We have other truck and crane sets that make really cool train combos.
customer_reviews.author: J. River

customer_reviews.title: Cool and sturdy board
customer_reviews.text: My son really enjoys this item. I only rated 4 our of 5 stars because the mini basketball that comes with doesn't necessarily fit the hoop or goes in easily. I luckily bought 3 extra balls from another seller coincidentally and those balls fit better. Otherwise the board is a good and sturdy item and fits our door just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Crackcorn

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old LOVES
customer_reviews.text: I don't even remember what age this was marketed to but my 3 yo and 1.5 yo both love this. Easy to assemble for the older. Both love to play with it. Quality pieces. Love that it came with animals and people and included the number 0.
customer_reviews.author: SLC

customer_reviews.title: Duplo, great toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my thirteen month old great-great nephew. He lives out of state, so I had them delivered to his home. My great niece said he absolutely loves them, I love them because they are fun, but also are a learning toy!
customer_reviews.author: craftygrandma

customer_reviews.title: Fun easy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: I played this a lot with my daughter, it surely helps to bring out the creativity of my 3 years old, she played it with for couple of days non stop, now will bring it out again after 2 months as a new toy. You can make many combinations with the objects and also play some number games.
customer_reviews.author: GreyHuman

customer_reviews.title: I wish it was
customer_reviews.text: My 11 month old loves it. Although I wish it was a little tighter because they do come apart very easy and makes it hard to push train around and when trains are together they come apart at times as well. Other than that its cute.
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my nephew. He loves it. He plays with it pretty roughly and the bricks haven't endured any damage. Its Duplo, so the bricks are as quality as you've come to expect from the Lego brand. My only complaint is that they don't have more train sets that don't require a track.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Cool Bday gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift and it went over very well. Can build as a train or use as regular blocks, along with using it with other toys. I think the price is very reasonable and so far the blocks/train are holding up very well (been almost a year now). Really cool set!
customer_reviews.author: Rumrunner

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for my boys 1 and almost 3
customer_reviews.text: My boys, one and almost three, both love this set. I have also been using it to help teach my almost three year old to recognize written numbers. We made a game of trying to put the number blocks in order on the train. I would caution that the little person and cat that comes with it are too small for children who still put things in their mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Tony K. Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old is loving this toy!! My only complaint is that the cars come apart too easily, which can be frustrating to toddlers who want to pick up and move things often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect together & stays connected well! None of the pieces are too small. My son was/is very pleased with this toy ( 2 years old). My 16 month old daughter also seemed interested in it once it was all put together!
customer_reviews.author: Shy 🌸

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Daughter
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old is now getting into Duplo and this was a good buy. It came exactly as shown and my daughter loves it. There a little choo-choo train lego bases that she can build on and connect together.
customer_reviews.author: Krisha Watamura

customer_reviews.title: Nice toy but could be improved
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for toddlers. I wish the numbers were on all sides of the cube. The toy is cute and holds her Inter for a while. But once assembled it also falls apart pretty quickly which can frustrate longer term play.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Endless play
customer_reviews.text: This has seriously been one of the best toy purchases I have made for any of my four children. Combined with one other Duplo set, this has provided countless hours of play for my 2-year-old. Can't recommend this enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Griffis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for a one year old. . .I'd wait until the child is a little older.
customer_reviews.author: Art Teacher

customer_reviews.title: Great learning tool
customer_reviews.text: This has been used daily since the start of August. My son picked up counting really well. Perfect for anyone else who wants to start counting with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Diego C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Birthday Gift
customer_reviews.text: This made for the perfect birthday gift for my nephew who loves counting and building. I'm a big fan of Dulplo products and their durability.
customer_reviews.author: Belle

customer_reviews.title: Teaches motor skills and numbers
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old nephew loved this, and was able to assemble all by himself perfectly. I was shocked. He's a smart little guy. Great for teaching numbers at an early age.
customer_reviews.author: MaLouO

customer_reviews.title: Fun Number Train
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my grandchildren and they love playing with this train. Putting it together is easy for them. We use the numbers to teach them about numbers and number order.
customer_reviews.author: TGFaith08

customer_reviews.title: My 2.5 year old loves this train LEGO set!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old loves this train LEGO set! It added to her collection. The colors a vibrant and the fun little people and cat are her new favorite. I got a really good deal on these.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Sent this to my sister as a gift. Her husband loves legos and they are expecting a little boy. I thought this would be a good gift for when he gets older. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this train set. To my surprise it entertains her for long periods of time. She’s fairly rough on them and they hold up. My dog even got ahold of some pieces and it stood up to some chewing. Would definitely recommend as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Holden

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my three-year-old for Christmas. He’s had hours and hours of use out of these. These would be an excellent gift for any 2 to 4-year-old. We highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: NathanDAnderson

customer_reviews.title: A lot of fun for our little boy!
customer_reviews.text: Gifted this to my 3 year old nephew for Christmas and have heard nothing but good things from my sis. He’s a rascal and his own master of disaster and so far these have held up nicely. Absolutely loves them and they’re still intact. 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: melinda lockhart

customer_reviews.title: Lego train
customer_reviews.text: My three year old grandson played with nothing but this on Christmas. His mom said this was his favorite toy and he got a lot of nice toys for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Denise A. Niederriter

customer_reviews.title: kids love playing with it
customer_reviews.text: This was a great set to add to our current duple collection. The kids like making the train, but they also like turning it into other fun creations.
customer_reviews.author: Addison Thomas

customer_reviews.title: My toddler LOVES this set! He loves to name the numbers!
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute LEGO set! I love how there are number blocks to teach kids their numbers. Would def recommend this for anyone who likes building blocks!
customer_reviews.author: camquatch

customer_reviews.title: Gift for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for our 2.5 year old niece. This was her very first LEGO DUPLO set and she loves it! We love that it has the numbers, since she is practicing recognizing the printed numbers now that she knows how to recognize numbers of things!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 2 year old and she loves it. It came with the cute figures and cat which she loves, nothing damaged and I believe this is great for the price. Her and her 6 year sister are huge fans of duplo/legos.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small ages boy or girl!
customer_reviews.text: My 1yr old loves it. Very easy for him to assemble and take apart. Big pieces so safe to not swallow if put in mouth and doesn't have stickers on it so if in mouth doesn't get nasty or fall apart. Easy to clean and helps with learning to count and build while having fun playing. What child doesn't love trains perfect for boy or girl because it comes with a boy and girl Lego piece and multi color blocks.
customer_reviews.author: Meeka

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces, but so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Our set was missing the number 2, the black cat, and the roof for the engine, but my 2 yo loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S.

customer_reviews.title: Husband Loves Legos.
customer_reviews.text: We love this train set! Bought as a birthday gift for our one year old. Husband is a big LEGO fan so he couldn’t wait until the “18 month” recommendation. Right now she just pushes it along the floor but she’s entertained and I know it will be something we have out for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: VacationlandLVR

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these!! My little guy is 15 months old. The little characters and blocks aren't easy to swallow. Lots of color and love the numbered blocks. He plays with these all the time, takes them apart, puts them back together. Great toddler toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun Choo Choo
customer_reviews.text: Hours of possibilities for fun for our 2 1/2 year old grandson. These Duplo blocks "live" at our house and are an immediate draw when our grandson visits. He loves his "Choo choo" and the numbered blocks. Duplos are a no brainer purchase in our house. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: ETNFOLIAGELOVER

customer_reviews.title: Gotta love Duplo!
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to go wrong with Duplo. This train is cute and I like that it can be put together however your little one’s heart desires. I sort of regret buying it for my baby boy, though, since he wasn’t yet 1 when he got it. He just wanted to pull everything apart. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Amy L

customer_reviews.title: Kids like trains.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my friends son and she was so happy for her son that he got new train toy especially boys love cars trains etc. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rustam

customer_reviews.title: So cute I bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Lego brand is always the best quality. No substitutes even come close. Always worth the few extra dollars to get the best brand.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S

customer_reviews.title: great toy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my great grandson's 2nd birthday and he loves it. He tries to connect other toy trains and cars to it and gets mad because they don't connect but he loves this toy. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: bets

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Cant wait to buy more of these. I was scared of chocking hazzard with the lego dolls, but the sized are perfect for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: Get it!!
customer_reviews.text: Both my 4 year old and 2 year old love it. I've had it for a year already and it's great, durable and it's just fun for them. Don't skip on it!
customer_reviews.author: Winter_TAK

customer_reviews.title: It was age appropriate for a 2-year old boy
customer_reviews.text: I have not seen it personally, it was sent directly to my son to be given so his grandson as a Christmas gift. He reported that Liam was thrilled and played with it the entire day. I believe it was a perfect age-appropriate gift
customer_reviews.author: Carmen B

customer_reviews.title: duplo train set
customer_reviews.text: duplos are great for kids. any time you can find a good deal on them children under 4 love them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G.

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy for young toddlers. Duplos are the greatest and I love how simple this set is. My almost-one-year-old plays with it and I’m sure she will play with it more as time goes on.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Great for train & LEGO lovers!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son who is 19 months old and loves trains. He loves putting all the train carts together. It’s easy enough for him to do, but, they stay together much better than mega blocks
customer_reviews.author: mpinder

customer_reviews.title: 2 Year Old Boy Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old nephew loved this train and so did my other 2 year old nephew. Great gift - I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Creative fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 2 years old. It's a great Christmas gift and she loves it. The color is bright and colorful and she enjoys playing this train set.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew who just turned 2. Loves it, ignored all the other gifts and just played with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jones

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: I usually find Duplo's to be too expensive. This train set wasn't bad and my 2 year old loves to play with it. She recognizes the numbers now and of course loves driving the cars or train around.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Fleischhauer

customer_reviews.title: Love the counting
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has fun using the numbers in this set. It is a great way to work with counting and play.
customer_reviews.author: Walkingbird

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter likes
customer_reviews.text: She plays with it a lot and really likes changing things around. Speedy delivery and well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: louise a rhinehart

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for our preschooler
customer_reviews.text: We love Legos and Duplos. Building is something we can do together. This was a great toy for our preschooler who is learning his numbers. And he loves trains.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A

customer_reviews.title: Great for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, bright colors. Good educational toy. My 20 month old grandson enjoys playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: Margie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Granddaughter loves it and it’s compatible with the mega block set she already has.
customer_reviews.author: LisaLovesShoes!

customer_reviews.title: Great First Train
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our grandson, who absolutely loves choo choo trains, at around 18-19 months. Loved it from the moment it was opened and it is not a toy that sits in the corner, but is enjoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Feedback

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler toy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for a 2 year old and it is perfect. It is safe, brightly colored and sparks the imagination.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Beckett

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson, who loves it. The parts are big and easy for a toddler. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Goodman

customer_reviews.title: Nice and safe toy
customer_reviews.text: Duplo is great for young kids to play and assemble. Large enough to handle and not to be accidentally swallowed.
customer_reviews.author: GCPangsa_1

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: Our two year old is nuts about it. The best decision we ever made. He has been destroying his older brother's legos. So the duple sets, and we bought a few, solved that problem! Great great product!
customer_reviews.author: ShopGirl

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old was so happy with hia birthday gift. He loves legos.
customer_reviews.author: YoungRabbit

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my nephew for his 2nd bday. He instantly started stacking the blocks. Within a few minutes he saw it was a train & kept putting it together & taking it apart again. He played with it the whole evening.
customer_reviews.author: MamaZ10

customer_reviews.title: Falls Apart
customer_reviews.text: My 2yr old is completely satisfied which is what matters. For me I find it annoying how easily it breaks apart while you’re playing with it. My son will be driving it on the floor and the back falls off. He gets a little sad/frustrated but I fix it and he moves on.
customer_reviews.author: Brittnie Bruin

customer_reviews.title: We shall see
customer_reviews.text: Not sure on the assembly because this is a gift for my grandson and he hasn't opened it yet
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Smith Howell

customer_reviews.title: Cute and colorful
customer_reviews.text: Cute LEGO toy. I bought this for my 3 yr old son. He wasn’t too interested in it and hasn’t played with the LEGO train since. Other kids may like it though. It’s colorful and a good addition to building a LEGO collection. Came in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Jose Flores

customer_reviews.title: No tiny parts,very colorful and helps them learn
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. Both of my kids love it. My son is 1, and my daughter is 4
customer_reviews.author: Christina k.

customer_reviews.title: fun learning numbers
customer_reviews.text: our class loves this toy.really helps with learning number sequence
customer_reviews.author: dalena lopez

customer_reviews.title: Toddler loves ledo duplo on wheels
customer_reviews.text: A good first touch to Lego duplo. The train is a fun and interactive toy for toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Carin

customer_reviews.title: My little man loves legos
customer_reviews.text: Bought to go with a lego table that isnt made anymore.They stopped making the table about 16 years ago.My 17 mth old loves these size legos.
customer_reviews.author: T. Russ

customer_reviews.title: One yr old loves
customer_reviews.text: My one year old loves this duplo and the pieces are great for him to play.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: We love thwt this comes with wheels to build on, numbers to practice and a person and cat. This isbthe perfect gift. So much fun.
customer_reviews.author: kelli

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a toy to add to my collection in my office to keep kiddos busy while I speak with their parents. This is perfect! Kids love building the train and pretending with the figures--the kitty is the favorite!
customer_reviews.author: April Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 19 mo old son loves these! He enjoys using the train when we assemble it together, and he loves dumping the pieces out of the box and putting them away again. I like that the pieces are numbered so we can practice counting, too!
customer_reviews.author: RLS

customer_reviews.title: My Granddaughters love this kit
customer_reviews.text: One of my granddaughters, the 1 1/2 year old, walks around holding the cat character all day. She loves to play with the other characters and the cab of the engine. The other granddaughter, like to stack the blocks,count with and to recognize the numbers. She is 2 1/2. What can you say, these are Duplos, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: willchaul

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son got this as a gift for Christmas when he was 1.5 yrs and loved it. It comes with a decent amount of legos for the price. He likes it so much I brought one for his friend for his 2nd birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Learning to count.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it to my todler to learn numbers. Great she loved it. She knows how to put in order.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: Hey it's Legos
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple Duplo Lego set that the kids can play with. It has 5 cars to the train set...plenty for the little ones to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my friend's son and he couldn't be happier!! I think that every toddler needs something Lego.
customer_reviews.author: Lillith16

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Duplo toy
customer_reviews.text: I buy this toy for every little kid I know. It’s a favorite. A 2 year old I recently gave it to is obsessed with the cat.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyTeaSets

product_meta.title: LEGO DUPLO My First Number Train 10847 Learning and Counting Train Set Building Kit and Educational Toy for 1 1/2-3 Year Olds (23 pieces)
product_meta.description: The LEGO DUPLO number train is a colorful introduction to numbers and counting. Your preschool toddler will love to build and rebuild this train toy, learning early number recognition as they go! With two child DUPLO figures and a cat figure for added role-play opportunities, this set provides endless building, driving and learning fun. Put your toddler on the right track to Number Town with this colorful educational train toy! The large DUPLO bricks are designed to be safe and suitable for little hands.
feature_bullets: Learning how to count is an important milestone in any child's life, and now your preschooler can have fun while learning with this popular number train set from LEGO DUPLO
This number train set includes a buildable locomotive and three wagons, bricks decorated with the numbers 0 through 9, two child LEGO DUPLO figures, plus a cat figure

Your toddler can build and rebuild the colorful number train building kit while role-playing with the DUPLO people and animal figures; This educational toy helps with counting and number learning in a way that engages children
LEGO DUPLO toys encourage building skills and imaginative play in toddlers and small children

Locomotive with caboose attached measures over 3-inch (10cm) high, 14-inch (37cm) long and 2-inch (6cm) wide; This number train set includes 23 pieces and makes a great educational toy for 2,3,4 and 5 year old boys and girls

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
